title: Method Statement for Insulation of Chilled Water Pipe and Ancill
description:
Method Statement for Insulation of Chilled Water Pipe and Ancillaries.

Document Summary:Method Statement for Insulation of Chilled Water Pipe and Ancillaries is Mechanical Engineering documentation suitable for MEP Construction.  See below synopsis:

This method statement deals with insulation of CHILLED WATER PIPE WORK
AND ANCILLARIES  ( above ground ). Before commencement of insulation activities, all Insulation material must be conform to approved shop drawings and material submittals.  The purpose of this document is to define the procedure for the above-mentioned work. The implementation of correct practice for the insulation of Chilled Water Pipe Work and Ancillaries through the general procedures contained herein.
                        
GENERAL
                               
 The insulation of pipe work and ancillaries will be achieve in accordance with 
 requirement of the local codes, manufacturerÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s recommendation as per the 
 material submittal and the following international codes. 
      
RESPONSIBILITIES
All works associated with the above-mentioned project to the supply and 
 installation of Chilled Water Pipe Work and Ancillaries, will be the responsibilities of the sub-contractor in accordance with the contract documents. The document is editable according to your preferences.
